prompts: Create a ghost-type Pokemon with a spooky appearance and ethereal features.
I want a dark, shadowy creature that can haunt its enemies with a chilling presence.
Generate a Pokemon that can float through walls and has claw-like hands.
Make a mysterious Pokemon that thrives in urban areas and has a mischievous personality.
Imagine a ghostly being that can disappear and reappear at will, with a haunting laugh.
Design a Pokemon with a purple hue and a creepy grin that lurks in caves.
Show me a ghost-type Pokemon that has both playful and sinister traits.
